results.title: Watermelon - Wikipedia
results.description: Watermelon (Citrullus lanatus) is a flowering plant species of the Cucurbitaceae family and the name of its edible fruit.

results.title: Watermelon — properties, vitamins, sugar, calories. | Medium
results.description: Watermelon is one of those fruits that, thanks to its high water content, quenches our thirst during the hot summer months. It is also a perfect ingredient for cocktails and desserts.

results.title: Watermelon : A Complete Guide to the Juicy Fruit
results.description: In this comprehensive guide, we will explore the origins, nutritional benefits, cultivation techniques, popular varieties, and various culinary uses of watermelon.

results.description: Looking for the watermelon translation from English into Russian? Yandex Translate has got you covered! Our free and reliable tool provides accurate translations for over 90...

results.title: Watermelon: Berry Or Fruit? | ShunCy
results.description: While it may seem obvious that watermelon is a fruit, the truth is actually quite surprising. Watermelon is not only a fruit, but also classified as a berry.

results.title: Watermelon - New World Encyclopedia
results.description: The flesh is similar to the rind of a watermelon and is often known as citron melon (distinct from the actual citron, of the citrus family).

results.title: Watermelon: Nutrition facts, benefits, and downsides
results.description: Watermelon nutrition facts. Watermelon consists mostly of water (91%) and carbs (7.5%). It provides almost no protein or fat and is very low in calories.

results.title: Is Watermelon a Berry or a Fruit?
results.description: Watermelon (Citrullus lanatus) is a succulent fruit and vine-like plant belonging to the Cucurbitaceae family; it is native to equatorial Africa and grown worldwide.

results.title: What Is The History Of Watermelon? - Stellina Marfa
results.description: Watermelon’s history dates back 5000 years to southern Africa where the tough, drought-tolerant ancestor of watermelon thrived.

results.title: Is A Watermelon A Berry (Or Vegetable)?
results.description: A watermelon is a common summertime fruit, but it is also a vegetable. It belongs to the gourd family and is considered a berry.
